title: Riot stop placing me in teams that are lower elo than the enemy........!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
body: Riot stop making my games suck.  I got 1/5 even match ups.  My team is normally lower ELO and rank.  It is saddening to have to play perfectly every game just to keep winning.  Riot answer my question, WHY does my team usually have the disadvantage in rank?

replies.body:
I dont care about your plat tier, but your MMR is like gold 3 to 4 level.
Which means the system concluded that you are getting shrekt by the enemy.

You can even get matched into silvers at this point, you need to pull yourself together.
One option is that you wait for the new systems to start settling a bit.  If you've read the notes, then you know that the initial pairings are going to be a bit odd at times.
There's probably a premade in your team so matchmaking is giving your team a handicap.
